$Billy Herman's throw beat Leo Durocher to 1B and 1B umpire Beans Reardon called Durocher out to end the inning; Joe Medwick had run to 3B; Medwick cut across infield to argue the call while Ripper Collins rolled the ball towards the mound; Reardon reversed his call realizing Collins hadn't touched 1B; Medwick took a sharp right turn and ran to HP; the Cardinals stopped arguing but the Cubs started; the umpires huddled and ruled Medwick must stop at 3B since the play stopped when the argument started; the Cardinals played the rest of game under protest
